message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $130 is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'm making a counteroffer to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm not willing to go as low as $110, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I'm making a counteroffer to you at $122.50
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
